openingPassage.title: Opening Passage
openingPassage.content: You are deep within a forest. You see a village in the distance

Village.title: Village
Village.content: You explore the village. The villagers seems busy and you are not noticed...

Tavern.title: Tavern
Tavern.content: You are in the tavern. It`s run down. There is a woman in the bar and drunk man in the dark corner...

Tavern Lady.title: Tavern Lady
Tavern Lady.content: You slowly approach the lady as she whispers  "You are not welcome here"

Scary man.title: Scary man
Scary man.content: You approach the suspucious looking man. He is snoring

Coin steal.title: Coin steal
Coin steal.content: You searched the old mans wallet. You found 50 coins! The man dosent seem to wake up

Old man woke.title: Old man woke
Old man woke.content: The old man wakes up and draws his axe.

Old man Fought.title: Old man Fought
Old man Fought.content: You fight like a hero until you die a misarable death

Deep Forest.title: Deep Forest
Deep Forest.content: You are deep in the forest, you are surrounded by trees. Suddenly, a flickering light captures your attention.

links.text: Ignore the light and walk deeper into the forest

Mysterious Light.title: Mysterious Light
Mysterious Light.content: You reach the source of the light. A beautiful fairy floats before you, illuminating the forest. She has an offer for you...

Fairy Offer.title: Fairy Offer
Fairy Offer.content: The fairy grants you strength. You return to the village and face the old man. You are victorious!

Refused Offer.title: Refused Offer
Refused Offer.content: You decide to go your own way. But without the fairy's blessing, you have to confront the old man again...

Deep Forest End.title: Deep Forest End
Deep Forest End.content: You get lost in the forest. You spend days searching for a way out, but you never do...
